welcome_message_body: Welcome to Komatsu, Japan, where tradition meets modernity in a beautiful blend. Explore our rich cultural heritage, stunning natural landscapes, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a memorable time discovering all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: 餃子菜館勝ちゃん
restaurants.description: 餃子菜館勝ちゃん is a chinese restaurant located in 小松市.
restaurants.address: 土居原町393, 小松市, 石川県, 923-0921

restaurants.name: すし食いねえ！ 小松沖店
restaurants.description: すし食いねえ！ 小松沖店 is a sushi restaurant located in 小松市.

restaurants.name: スシロー 小松有明店
restaurants.description: スシロー 小松有明店 is a sushi restaurant located in 小松市.

restaurants.name: Hachiban Ramen (8番らーめん 小松店)
restaurants.description: Hachiban Ramen (8番らーめん 小松店) is a ramen restaurant located in 小松市.
restaurants.address: 有明町23, 小松市, 石川県, 923-0864

restaurants.name: カレーのチャンピオン 小松店
restaurants.description: カレーのチャンピオン 小松店 is a japanese curry restaurant located in 小松市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komatsu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Komatsu Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'KMQ Free WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fukui Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fukui Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
